title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, Definition of thermodynamic terms, First law of thermodynamics, Heat capacity and enthalpy, Second law of thermodynamics and entropy, Auxiliary function, Maxwellâs relations, Transformation formula, Gibbs-Helmholtz equation, Third law of thermodynamics, Fugacity, Activity and equilibrium constant, Ellingham- Richardson diagram, Thermodynamics of solutions, Interaction parameter with respect to iron and steel making. Thermodynamics of slag-metal reaction, Phase rule, phase equilibria and free energy-composition diagram. Applications to various problems in industry.
